name: Wave
title: waveapps.com
shortDescription: Wave is a comprehensive financial platform designed specifically for small business owners and solopreneurs. It simplifies the creation of invoices, managing online payments, and streamlining accounting processes. An example use case is a freelance graphic designer using Wave to issue invoices, track payments, and manage expenses efficiently.
pros: Free basic services with no hidden costs
cons: No advanced features for larger businesses
